Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes advice and information given to the patient or patient's representative.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Provision of Advice subset with subset original id 1041000000132.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
